163 private int selectedModeIndex;
164 public int SelectedModeIndex
165 {
166 get { return selectedModeIndex; }
167 set
168 {
169 if (HighlightedModeIndex == selectedModeIndex)
170 {
171 ModeList.Select(value);
172 }
173 selectedModeIndex = value;
174 }
175 }
176
177 public int HighlightedModeIndex
178 {
179 get { return ModeList.SelectedIndex; }
180 set
181 {
182 ModeList.Select(value, true);
183 }
184 }

231
232 public MissionType MissionType
233 {
234 get
235 {
236 MissionType retVal = MissionType.None;
237 int index = 0;
238 foreach (MissionType type in Enum.GetValues(typeof(MissionType)))
239 {
240 if (type == MissionType.None || type == MissionType.All) { continue; }
241
242 if (missionTypeTickBoxes[index].Selected)
243 {
244 retVal = (MissionType)((int)retVal | (int)type);
245 }
246
247 index++;
248 }
249
250 return retVal;
251 }
252 set
253 {
254 int index = 0;
255 foreach (MissionType type in Enum.GetValues(typeof(MissionType)))
256 {
257 if (type == MissionType.None || type == MissionType.All) { continue; }
258 missionTypeTickBoxes[index].Selected = ((int)type & (int)value) != 0;
259 index++;
260 }
261 }
262 }
263
264 public List<JobVariant> JobPreferences
265 {
266 get
267 {
268 // JobList if the server has already assigned the player a job
269 // (e.g. the player has a pre-existing campaign character)
270 if (JobList?.Content == null)
271 {
272 return new List<JobVariant>();
273 }
274
275 List<JobVariant> jobPreferences = new List<JobVariant>();
276 foreach (GUIComponent child in JobList.Content.Children)
277 {
278 if (!(child.UserData is JobVariant jobPrefab)) { continue; }
279 jobPreferences.Add(jobPrefab);
280 }
281 return jobPreferences;
282 }
283 }
284
285 public string LevelSeed
286 {
287 get
288 {
289 return levelSeed;
290 }
291 set
292 {
293 if (levelSeed == value) return;
294
295 levelSeed = value;
296
297 int intSeed = ToolBox.StringToInt(levelSeed);
298 backgroundSprite = LocationType.Random(new MTRandom(intSeed))?.GetPortrait(intSeed);
299 SeedBox.Text = levelSeed;
300 }
301 }

720
721 void updateServerMessageScrollBasedOnCaret()
722 {
723 float caretY = ServerMessage.CaretScreenPos.Y;
724 float bottomCaretExtent = ServerMessage.Font.LineHeight * 1.5f;
725 float topCaretExtent = -ServerMessage.Font.LineHeight * 0.5f;
726 if (caretY + bottomCaretExtent > serverMessageContainer.Rect.Bottom)
727 {
728 serverMessageContainer.ScrollBar.BarScroll
729 = (caretY - ServerMessage.Rect.Top - serverMessageContainer.Rect.Height + bottomCaretExtent)
730 / (ServerMessage.Rect.Height - serverMessageContainer.Rect.Height);
731 }
732 else if (caretY + topCaretExtent < serverMessageContainer.Rect.Top)
733 {
734 serverMessageContainer.ScrollBar.BarScroll
735 = (caretY - ServerMessage.Rect.Top + topCaretExtent)
736 / (ServerMessage.Rect.Height - serverMessageContainer.Rect.Height);
737 }
738 }
739
740 ServerMessage.OnSelected += (textBox, key) =>
741 {
742 serverMessageHint.Visible = false;
743 updateServerMessageScrollBasedOnCaret();
744 };
745 ServerMessage.OnTextChanged += (textBox, text) =>
746 {
747 Vector2 textSize = textBox.Font.MeasureString(textBox.WrappedText);
748 textBox.RectTransform.NonScaledSize = new Point(textBox.RectTransform.NonScaledSize.X, Math.Max(serverMessageContainer.Content.Rect.Height, (int)textSize.Y + 10));
749 serverMessageContainer.UpdateScrollBarSize();
750 serverMessageHint.Visible = !textBox.Selected && !textBox.Readonly && string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(textBox.Text);
751 return true;
752 };
753 ServerMessage.OnEnterPressed += (textBox, text) =>
754 {
755 string str = textBox.Text;
756 int caretIndex = textBox.CaretIndex;
757 textBox.Text = $"{str[..caretIndex]}\n{str[caretIndex..]}";
758 textBox.CaretIndex = caretIndex + 1;
759
760 return true;
761 };
762 ServerMessage.OnDeselected += (textBox, key) =>
763 {
764 if (GameMain.Client == null) { return; }
765 if (!textBox.Readonly)
766 {
767 GameMain.Client?.ServerSettings?.ClientAdminWrite(ServerSettings.NetFlags.Message);
768 }
769 serverMessageHint.Visible = !textBox.Readonly && string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(textBox.Text);
770 };
771
772 ServerMessage.OnKeyHit += (sender, key) => updateServerMessageScrollBasedOnCaret();
773
774
775 clientHiddenElements.Add(serverMessageHint);
776 clientReadonlyElements.Add(ServerMessage);

1207
1208 public void StopWaitingForStartRound()
1209 {
1210 CoroutineManager.StopCoroutines("WaitForStartRound");
1211
1212 if (StartButton != null)
1213 {
1214 StartButton.Enabled = true;
1215 }
1216 GUI.ClearCursorWait();
1217 }
1218
1219 public IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> WaitForStartRound(GUIButton startButton)
1220 {
1221 GUI.SetCursorWaiting();
1222 LocalizedString headerText = TextManager.Get("RoundStartingPleaseWait");
1223 var msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(headerText, TextManager.Get("RoundStarting"), Array.Empty<LocalizedString>());
1224
1225 if (startButton != null)
1226 {
1227 startButton.Enabled = false;
1228 }
1229
1230 DateTime timeOut = DateTime.Now + new TimeSpan(0, 0, 10);
1231 while (Selected == GameMain.NetLobbyScreen && DateTime.Now < timeOut)
1232 {
1233 msgBox.Header.Text = headerText + new string('.', ((int)Timing.TotalTime % 3 + 1));
1234 yield return CoroutineStatus.Running;
1235 }
1236
1237 msgBox.Close();
1238 if (startButton != null)
1239 {
1240 startButton.Enabled = true;
1241 }
1242 GUI.ClearCursorWait();
1243 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
1244 }

1246 public override void Deselect()
1247 {
1248 chatInput.Deselect();
1249 CampaignCharacterDiscarded = false;
1250
1251 CharacterAppearanceCustomizationMenu?.Dispose();
1252 JobSelectionFrame = null;
1253
1254 /*foreach (Sprite sprite in jobPreferenceSprites) { sprite.Remove(); }
1255 jobPreferenceSprites.Clear();*/
1256 }
1257
1258 public override void Select()
1259 {
1260 if (GameMain.NetworkMember == null) { return; }
1261
1262 visibilityMenuOrder.Clear();
1263
1264 CharacterAppearanceCustomizationMenu?.Dispose();
1265 JobSelectionFrame = null;
1266
1267 infoFrameContent.Recalculate();
1268
1269 Character.Controlled = null;
1270 GameMain.LightManager.LosEnabled = false;
1271 GUI.PreventPauseMenuToggle = false;
1272 CampaignCharacterDiscarded = false;
1273
1274 chatInput.Select();
1275 chatInput.OnEnterPressed = GameMain.Client.EnterChatMessage;
1276 chatInput.OnTextChanged += GameMain.Client.TypingChatMessage;
1277 chatInput.OnDeselected += (sender, key) =>
1278 {
1279 if (GameMain.Client != null)
1280 {
1281 GameMain.Client.ChatBox.ChatManager.Clear();
1282 }
1283 };
1284
1285 //disable/hide elements the clients are not supposed to use/see
1286 clientDisabledElements.ForEach(c => c.Enabled = false);
1287 clientReadonlyElements.ForEach(c => c.Readonly = true);
1288 clientHiddenElements.ForEach(c => c.Visible = false);
1289
1290 RefreshEnabledElements();
1291
1292 if (GameMain.Client != null)
1293 {
1294 ChatManager.RegisterKeys(chatInput, GameMain.Client.ChatBox.ChatManager);
1295 spectateButton.Visible = GameMain.Client.GameStarted;
1296 ReadyToStartBox.Selected = false;
1297 GameMain.Client.SetReadyToStart(ReadyToStartBox);
1298 }
1299 else
1300 {
1301 spectateButton.Visible = false;
1302 }
1303 SetSpectate(spectateBox.Selected);
1304
1305 if (GameMain.Client != null)
1306 {
1307 GameMain.Client.Voting.ResetVotes(GameMain.Client.ConnectedClients);
1308 spectateButton.OnClicked = GameMain.Client.SpectateClicked;
1309 ReadyToStartBox.OnSelected = GameMain.Client.SetReadyToStart;
1310 }
1311
1312 roundControlsHolder.Children.ForEach(c => c.IgnoreLayoutGroups = !c.Visible);
1313 roundControlsHolder.Recalculate();
1314
1315 base.Select();
1316 }

1324 {

1326 ServerMessage.Readonly = !GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1327 missionTypeList.Enabled = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);

1331 }

1333 levelDifficultyScrollBar.Enabled = !CampaignFrame.Visible && !CampaignSetupFrame.Visible && GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1334 levelDifficultyScrollBar.ToolTip = string.Empty;
1335 if (!levelDifficultyScrollBar.Enabled)

1337 levelDifficultyScrollBar.ToolTip = TextManager.Get("campaigndifficultydisabled");
1338 }

1340 traitorProbabilityButtons[0].Enabled = traitorProbabilityButtons[1].Enabled = traitorProbabilityText.Enabled =
1341 !CampaignFrame.Visible && !CampaignSetupFrame.Visible && GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1342 botCountButtons[0].Enabled = botCountButtons[1].Enabled = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1343 botSpawnModeButtons[0].Enabled = botSpawnModeButtons[1].Enabled = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1344

1346
1347 SettingsButton.Visible = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1348 SettingsButton.OnClicked = GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.ToggleSettingsFrame;
1349 StartButton.Visible = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageRound) && !GameMain.Client.GameStarted && !CampaignSetupFrame.Visible && !CampaignFrame.Visible;
1350 ServerName.Readonly = !GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1351 ServerMessage.Readonly = !GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings);
1352 shuttleTickBox.Enabled = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings) && !GameMain.Client.GameStarted;
1353 SubList.Enabled = !CampaignFrame.Visible && (GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.AllowSubVoting || GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.SelectSub));
1354 ShuttleList.Enabled = ShuttleList.ButtonEnabled = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.SelectSub) && !GameMain.Client.GameStarted;

1356 LogButtons.Visible = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ServerLog);
1357 GameMain.Client.UpdateLogButtonPermissions();

1363
1364 ReadyToStartBox.Parent.Visible = !GameMain.Client.GameStarted;

1714 private void CreateJobVariantTooltip(JobPrefab jobPrefab, int variant, GUIComponent parentSlot)
1715 {
1716 jobVariantTooltip = new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(new Point((int)(400 * GUI.Scale), (int)(180 * GUI.Scale)), GUI.Canvas, pivot: Pivot.BottomRight),
1717 style: "GUIToolTip")
1718 {
1719 UserData = new JobVariant(jobPrefab, variant)
1720 };
1721 jobVariantTooltip.RectTransform.AbsoluteOffset = new Point(parentSlot.Rect.Right, parentSlot.Rect.Y);
1722
1723 var content = new GUILayoutGroup(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.95f, 0.95f), jobVariantTooltip.RectTransform, Anchor.Center))
1724 {
1725 Stretch = true,
1726 AbsoluteSpacing = (int)(15 * GUI.Scale)
1727 };
1728
1729 new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.0f), content.RectTransform), TextManager.GetWithVariable("startingequipmentname", "[number]", (variant + 1).ToString()), font: GUIStyle.SubHeadingFont, textAlignment: Alignment.Center);
1730
1731 var itemIdentifiers = jobPrefab.PreviewItems[variant]
1732 .Where(it => it.ShowPreview)
1733 .Select(it => it.ItemIdentifier)
1734 .Distinct();
1735
1736 int itemsPerRow = 5;
1737 int rows = (int)Math.Max(Math.Ceiling(itemIdentifiers.Count() / (float)itemsPerRow), 1);
1738
1739 new GUICustomComponent(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.4f * rows), content.RectTransform, Anchor.BottomCenter),
1740 onDraw: (sb, component) => { DrawJobVariantItems(sb, component, new JobVariant(jobPrefab, variant), itemsPerRow); });
1741
1742 jobVariantTooltip.RectTransform.MinSize = new Point(0, content.RectTransform.Children.Sum(c => c.Rect.Height + content.AbsoluteSpacing));
1743 }

1752 {

1755 if (spectate)
1756 {
1757 playerInfoContainer.ClearChildren();

1760 GameMain.Client.CharacterInfo = null;
1761 GameMain.Client.Character?.Remove();
1762 GameMain.Client.Character = null;
1763 new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(Vector2.One, playerInfoContainer.RectTransform, Anchor.Center),
1764 TextManager.Get("PlayingAsSpectator"),
1765 textAlignment: Alignment.Center);
1766 }
1767 else
1768 {
1769 UpdatePlayerFrame(campaignCharacterInfo, allowEditing: campaignCharacterInfo == null);
1770 }
1771 }

1773 public void SetAllowSpectating(bool allowSpectating)
1774 {
1775 // Server owner is allowed to spectate regardless of the server settings
1776 if (GameMain.Client != null && GameMain.Client.IsServerOwner) { return; }
1777
1778 // Show the player config menu if spectating is not allowed
1779 if (spectateBox.Selected && !allowSpectating) { spectateBox.Selected = false; }
1780
1781 // Hide spectate tickbox if spectating is not allowed
1782 spectateBox.Visible = allowSpectating;
1783 }

1796 public void UpdateSubList(GUIComponent subList, List<SubmarineInfo> submarines)
1797 {
1798 if (subList == null) { return; }
1799
1800 subList.ClearChildren();
1801
1802 foreach (SubmarineInfo sub in submarines)
1803 {
1804 AddSubmarine(subList, sub);
1805 }
1806 }
1807
1808 private void AddSubmarine(GUIComponent subList, SubmarineInfo sub)
1809 {
1810 if (subList is GUIListBox listBox)
1811 {
1812 subList = listBox.Content;
1813 }
1814 else if (subList is GUIDropDown dropDown)
1815 {
1816 subList = dropDown.ListBox.Content;
1817 }
1818
1819 var frame = new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.1f), subList.RectTransform) { MinSize = new Point(0, 20) },
1820 style: "ListBoxElement")
1821 {
1822 ToolTip = sub.Description,
1823 UserData = sub
1824 };
1825
1826 int buttonSize = (int)(frame.Rect.Height * 0.8f);
1827 var subTextBlock = new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.8f, 1.0f), frame.RectTransform, Anchor.CenterLeft) /*{ AbsoluteOffset = new Point(buttonSize + 5, 0) }*/,
1828 ToolBox.LimitString(sub.DisplayName.Value, GUIStyle.Font, subList.Rect.Width - 65), textAlignment: Alignment.CenterLeft)
1829 {
1830 CanBeFocused = false
1831 };
1832
1833 var matchingSub = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == sub.Name && s.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation == sub.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation);
1834 if (matchingSub == null) matchingSub = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == sub.Name);
1835
1836 if (matchingSub == null)
1837 {
1838 subTextBlock.TextColor = new Color(subTextBlock.TextColor, 0.5f);
1839 frame.ToolTip = TextManager.Get("SubNotFound");
1840 }
1841 else if (matchingSub?.MD5Hash == null || matchingSub.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation != sub.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation)
1842 {
1843 subTextBlock.TextColor = new Color(subTextBlock.TextColor, 0.5f);
1844 frame.ToolTip = TextManager.Get("SubDoesntMatch");
1845 }
1846 else
1847 {
1848 if (subList == ShuttleList || subList == ShuttleList.ListBox || subList == ShuttleList.ListBox.Content)
1849 {
1850 subTextBlock.TextColor = new Color(subTextBlock.TextColor, sub.HasTag(SubmarineTag.Shuttle) ? 1.0f : 0.6f);
1851 }
1852 }
1853
1854 if (!sub.RequiredContentPackagesInstalled)
1855 {
1856 subTextBlock.TextColor = Color.Lerp(subTextBlock.TextColor, Color.DarkRed, 0.5f);
1857 frame.ToolTip = TextManager.Get("ContentPackageMismatch") + "\n\n" + frame.ToolTip.SanitizedString;
1858 }
1859
1860 CreateSubmarineClassText(
1861 frame,
1862 sub,
1863 subTextBlock,
1864 subList);
1865 }

1867 private void CreateSubmarineClassText(
1868 GUIComponent parent,
1869 SubmarineInfo sub,

1871 GUIComponent subList)
1872 {

1876 TextManager.Get("Shuttle", "RespawnShuttle"), textAlignment: Alignment.CenterRight, font: GUIStyle.SmallFont)
1877 {

1879 ToolTip = subTextBlock.ToolTip?.SanitizedString,
1880 CanBeFocused = false
1881 };
1882 //make shuttles more dim in the sub list (selecting a shuttle as the main sub is allowed but not recommended)
1883 if (subList == this.SubList.Content)
1884 {
1885 subTextBlock.TextColor *= 0.8f;
1886 foreach (GUIComponent child in parent.Children)

1888 child.Color *= 0.8f;
1889 }
1890 }
1891 }
1892 else
1893 {
1894 new GUITextBlock(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.5f, 1.0f), parent.RectTransform, Anchor.CenterRight) { AbsoluteOffset = new Point(GUI.IntScale(20), 0) },
1895 TextManager.Get($"submarineclass.{sub.SubmarineClass}"), textAlignment: Alignment.CenterRight, font: GUIStyle.SmallFont)
1896 {
1897 UserData = "classtext",
1898 TextColor = subTextBlock.TextColor * 0.8f,
1899 ToolTip = subTextBlock.ToolTip,
1900 CanBeFocused = false
1901 };
1902 }

1904
1905 public bool VotableClicked(GUIComponent component, object userData)
1906 {
1907 if (GameMain.Client == null) { return false; }
1908
1909 VoteType voteType;
1910 if (component.Parent == GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SubList.Content)
1911 {
1912 if (!GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.AllowSubVoting)
1913 {
1914 var selectedSub = component.UserData as SubmarineInfo;
1915 if (!selectedSub.RequiredContentPackagesInstalled)
1916 {
1917 var msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("ContentPackageMismatch"),
1918 selectedSub.RequiredContentPackages.Any() ?
1919 TextManager.GetWithVariable("ContentPackageMismatchWarning", "[requiredcontentpackages]", string.Join(", ", selectedSub.RequiredContentPackages)) :
1920 TextManager.Get("ContentPackageMismatchWarningGeneric"),
1921 new LocalizedString[] { TextManager.Get("Yes"), TextManager.Get("No") });
1922
1923 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked = msgBox.Close;
1924 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked += (button, obj) =>
1925 {
1926 GameMain.Client.RequestSelectSub(component.Parent.GetChildIndex(component), isShuttle: false);
1927 return true;
1928 };
1929 msgBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked = msgBox.Close;
1930 return false;
1931 }
1932 else if (GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.SelectSub))
1933 {
1934 GameMain.Client.RequestSelectSub(component.Parent.GetChildIndex(component), isShuttle: false);
1935 return true;
1936 }
1937 return false;
1938 }
1939 if (component.UserData is SubmarineInfo sub)
1940 {
1941 CreateSubPreview(sub);
1942 }
1943 voteType = VoteType.Sub;
1944 }
1945 else if (component.Parent == GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.ModeList.Content)
1946 {
1947 if (!GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.AllowModeVoting)
1948 {
1949 if (GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.SelectMode))
1950 {
1951 Identifier presetName = ((GameModePreset)component.UserData).Identifier;
1952
1953 //display a verification prompt when switching away from the campaign
1954 if (HighlightedModeIndex == SelectedModeIndex &&
1955 (GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.ModeList.SelectedData as GameModePreset) == GameModePreset.MultiPlayerCampaign &&
1956 presetName != GameModePreset.MultiPlayerCampaign.Identifier)
1957 {
1958 var verificationBox = new GUIMessageBox("", TextManager.Get("endcampaignverification"), new LocalizedString[] { TextManager.Get("yes"), TextManager.Get("no") });
1959 verificationBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked += (btn, userdata) =>
1960 {
1961 GameMain.Client.RequestSelectMode(component.Parent.GetChildIndex(component));
1962 HighlightMode(SelectedModeIndex);
1963 verificationBox.Close(btn, userdata);
1964 return true;
1965 };
1966 verificationBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked = verificationBox.Close;
1967 return false;
1968 }
1969 GameMain.Client.RequestSelectMode(component.Parent.GetChildIndex(component));
1970 HighlightMode(SelectedModeIndex);
1971
1972 if (presetName == "multiplayercampaign")
1973 {
1974 GUI.SetCursorWaiting(endCondition: () =>
1975 {
1976 return CampaignFrame.Visible || CampaignSetupFrame.Visible;
1977 });
1978 }
1979
1980 return presetName != "multiplayercampaign";
1981 }
1982 return false;
1983 }
1984 else if (!((GameModePreset)userData).Votable)
1985 {
1986 return false;
1987 }
1988
1989 voteType = VoteType.Mode;
1990 }
1991 else
1992 {
1993 return false;
1994 }
1995
1996 GameMain.Client.Vote(voteType, userData);
1997
1998 return true;
1999 }

2048
2049 private Action<SpriteBatch, GUICustomComponent> DrawDownloadThrobber(Client client, params GUIComponent[] otherComponents)
2050 => (sb, c) => DrawDownloadThrobber(client, otherComponents, sb, c); //poor man's currying
2051
2052 private void DrawDownloadThrobber(Client client, GUIComponent[] otherComponents, SpriteBatch spriteBatch, GUICustomComponent component)
2053 {
2054 if (!client.IsDownloading)
2055 {
2056 component.ToolTip = "";
2057 return;
2058 }
2059
2060 component.HideElementsOutsideFrame = false;
2061 int drawRectX = otherComponents.Where(c => c.Visible)
2062 .Select(c => c.Rect)
2063 .Concat(new Rectangle(component.Parent.Rect.Right, component.Parent.Rect.Y, 0, component.Parent.Rect.Height).ToEnumerable())
2064 .Min(r => r.X) - component.Parent.Rect.Height - 10;
2065 Rectangle drawRect
2066 = new Rectangle(drawRectX, component.Rect.Y, component.Parent.Rect.Height, component.Parent.Rect.Height);
2067 component.RectTransform.AbsoluteOffset = drawRect.Location - component.Parent.Rect.Location;
2068 component.RectTransform.NonScaledSize = drawRect.Size;
2069 var sheet = GUIStyle.GenericThrobber;
2070 sheet.Draw(
2071 spriteBatch,
2072 pos: drawRect.Location.ToVector2(),
2073 spriteIndex: (int)Math.Floor(Timing.TotalTime * 24.0f) % sheet.FrameCount,
2074 color: Color.White,
2075 origin: Vector2.Zero, rotate: 0.0f,
2076 scale: Vector2.One * component.Parent.Rect.Height / sheet.FrameSize.ToVector2());
2077 if (component.ToolTip.IsNullOrEmpty())
2078 {
2079 component.ToolTip = TextManager.Get("PlayerIsDownloadingFiles");
2080 }
2081 }

2083 public void SetPlayerNameAndJobPreference(Client client)
2084 {
2085 var playerFrame = (GUITextBlock)PlayerList.Content.FindChild(client);
2086 if (playerFrame == null) { return; }
2087 playerFrame.Text = client.Name;
2088
2089 playerFrame.ToolTip = "";
2090 Color color = Color.White;
2091 if (SelectedMode == GameModePreset.PvP)
2092 {
2093 switch (client.PreferredTeam)
2094 {
2095 case CharacterTeamType.Team1:
2096 color = new Color(0, 110, 150, 255);
2097 playerFrame.ToolTip = TextManager.GetWithVariable("teampreference", "[team]", TextManager.Get("teampreference.team1"));
2098 break;
2099 case CharacterTeamType.Team2:
2100 color = new Color(150, 110, 0, 255);
2101 playerFrame.ToolTip = TextManager.GetWithVariable("teampreference", "[team]", TextManager.Get("teampreference.team2"));
2102 break;
2103 default:
2104 playerFrame.ToolTip = TextManager.GetWithVariable("teampreference", "[team]", TextManager.Get("none"));
2105 break;
2106 }
2107 }
2108 else
2109 {
2110 if (JobPrefab.Prefabs.ContainsKey(client.PreferredJob))
2111 {
2112 color = JobPrefab.Prefabs[client.PreferredJob].UIColor;
2113 playerFrame.ToolTip = TextManager.GetWithVariable("jobpreference", "[job]", JobPrefab.Prefabs[client.PreferredJob].Name);
2114 }
2115 else
2116 {
2117 playerFrame.ToolTip = TextManager.GetWithVariable("jobpreference", "[job]", TextManager.Get("none"));
2118 }
2119 }
2120 playerFrame.Color = color * 0.4f;
2121 playerFrame.HoverColor = color * 0.6f;
2122 playerFrame.SelectedColor = color * 0.8f;
2123 playerFrame.OutlineColor = color * 0.5f;
2124 playerFrame.TextColor = color;
2125 }

2162 {

2165 ?? GameMain.Client.ConnectedClients.Find(c => c.ID == id)
2166 ?? GameMain.Client.PreviouslyConnectedClients.FirstOrDefault(c => c.SteamID == id)
2167 ?? GameMain.Client.PreviouslyConnectedClients.FirstOrDefault(c => c.ID == id);
2168 return client;
2169 }

2185 #region Context Menu
2186 public static void CreateModerationContextMenu(Client client)
2187 {
2188 if (GUIContextMenu.CurrentContextMenu != null) { return; }
2189 if (GameMain.IsSingleplayer || client == null || ((!GameMain.Client?.PreviouslyConnectedClients?.Contains(client)) ?? true)) { return; }
2190 bool hasSteam = client.SteamID > 0 && SteamManager.IsInitialized,
2191 canKick = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Kick),
2192 canBan = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Ban) && client.AllowKicking,
2193 canPromo = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManagePermissions);
2194
2195 // Disable options if we are targeting ourselves
2196 if (client.ID == GameMain.Client?.ID)
2197 {
2198 canKick = canBan = canPromo = false;
2199 }
2200
2201 List<ContextMenuOption> options = new List<ContextMenuOption>
2202 {
2203 new ContextMenuOption("ViewSteamProfile", isEnabled: hasSteam, onSelected: delegate
2204 {
2205 Steamworks.SteamFriends.OpenWebOverlay($"https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/{client.SteamID}");
2206 }),
2207 new ContextMenuOption("ModerationMenu.ManagePlayer", isEnabled: true, onSelected: delegate
2208 {
2209 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen?.SelectPlayer(client);
2210 })
2211 };
2212
2213 // Creates sub context menu options for all the ranks
2214 List<ContextMenuOption> rankOptions = new List<ContextMenuOption>();
2215 foreach (PermissionPreset rank in PermissionPreset.List)
2216 {
2217 rankOptions.Add(new ContextMenuOption(rank.Name, isEnabled: true, onSelected: () =>
2218 {
2219 LocalizedString label = TextManager.GetWithVariables(rank.Permissions == ClientPermissions.None ? "clearrankprompt" : "giverankprompt", ("[user]", client.Name), ("[rank]", rank.Name));
2220 GUIMessageBox msgBox = new GUIMessageBox(string.Empty, label, new[] { TextManager.Get("Yes"), TextManager.Get("Cancel") });
2221
2222 msgBox.Buttons[0].OnClicked = delegate
2223 {
2224 client.SetPermissions(rank.Permissions, rank.PermittedCommands);
2225 GameMain.Client.UpdateClientPermissions(client);
2226 msgBox.Close();
2227 return true;
2228 };
2229 msgBox.Buttons[1].OnClicked = delegate
2230 {
2231 msgBox.Close();
2232 return true;
2233 };
2234 }) { Tooltip = rank.Description });
2235 }
2236
2237 options.Add(new ContextMenuOption("Rank", isEnabled: canPromo, options: rankOptions.ToArray()));
2238
2239 Color clientColor = client.Character?.Info?.Job.Prefab.UIColor ?? Color.White;
2240
2241 if (GameMain.Client.ConnectedClients.Contains(client))
2242 {
2243 options.Add(new ContextMenuOption(client.MutedLocally ? "Unmute" : "Mute", isEnabled: client.ID != GameMain.Client?.ID, onSelected: delegate
2244 {
2245 client.MutedLocally = !client.MutedLocally;
2246 }));
2247
2248 bool kickEnabled = client.ID != GameMain.Client?.ID && client.AllowKicking;
2249
2250 // if the user can kick create a kick option else create the votekick option
2251 ContextMenuOption kickOption;
2252 if (canKick)
2253 {
2254 kickOption = new ContextMenuOption("Kick", isEnabled: kickEnabled, onSelected: delegate
2255 {
2256 GameMain.Client?.CreateKickReasonPrompt(client.Name, false);
2257 });
2258 }
2259 else
2260 {
2261 kickOption = new ContextMenuOption("VoteToKick", isEnabled: kickEnabled, onSelected: delegate
2262 {
2263 GameMain.Client?.VoteForKick(client);
2264 });
2265 }
2266
2267 options.Add(kickOption);
2268 }
2269
2270 options.Add(new ContextMenuOption("Ban", isEnabled: canBan, onSelected: delegate
2271 {
2272 GameMain.Client?.CreateKickReasonPrompt(client.Name, true);
2273 }));
2274
2275 GUIContextMenu.CreateContextMenu(null, client.Name, headerColor: clientColor, options.ToArray());
2276 }

2280 public bool SelectPlayer(Client selectedClient)
2281 {
2282 bool myClient = selectedClient.ID == GameMain.Client.ID;
2283 bool hasManagePermissions = GameMain.Client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManagePermissions);
2284
2285 PlayerFrame = new GUIButton(new RectTransform(Vector2.One, GUI.Canvas, Anchor.Center), style: null)

2321 foreach (PermissionPreset permissionPreset in PermissionPreset.List)

2325 rankDropDown.AddItem(TextManager.Get("CustomRank"), null);

2329 p.PermittedCommands.Count == selectedClient.PermittedConsoleCommands.Count && !p.PermittedCommands.Except(selectedClient.PermittedConsoleCommands).Any());

2358 {
2359 Stretch = true,
2360 RelativeSpacing = 0.05f
2361 };

2398

2400 TextManager.Get("ClientPermission." + permission), font: GUIStyle.SmallFont)
2401 {
2402 UserData = permission,
2403 Selected = selectedClient.HasPermission(permission),
2404 Enabled = !myClient,

2417 else

2424 }
2425 return true;

2429 }
2430
2431 var listBoxContainerRight = new GUILayoutGroup(new RectTransform(new Vector2(0.5f, 1.0f), permissionContainer.RectTransform))
2432 {
2433 Stretch = true,
2434 RelativeSpacing = 0.05f
2435 };
2436

2649 public override void Update(double deltaTime)
2650 {
2651 base.Update(deltaTime);
2652
2653 if (GameMain.Client == null) { return; }
2654
2655 Identifier currMicStyle = micIcon.Style.Element.NameAsIdentifier();
2656

2682 voipAmplitude = client.VoipSound?.CurrentAmplitude ?? 0.0f;

2693 voipAmplitude = voip.LastAmplitude;
2694 }

2697 }
2698 }
2699 }

2775 private void DrawJobVariantItems(SpriteBatch spriteBatch, GUICustomComponent component, JobVariant jobPrefab, int itemsPerRow)
2776 {
2777 var itemIdentifiers = jobPrefab.Prefab.PreviewItems[jobPrefab.Variant]
2778 .Where(it => it.ShowPreview)
2779 .Select(it => it.ItemIdentifier)
2780 .Distinct();
2781
2782 Point slotSize = new Point(component.Rect.Height);
2783 int spacing = (int)(5 * GUI.Scale);
2784 int slotCount = itemIdentifiers.Count();
2785 int slotCountPerRow = Math.Min(slotCount, itemsPerRow);
2786 int rows = (int)Math.Max(Math.Ceiling(itemIdentifiers.Count() / (float)itemsPerRow), 1);
2787
2788 float totalWidth = slotSize.X * slotCountPerRow + spacing * (slotCountPerRow - 1);
2789 float totalHeight = slotSize.Y * rows + spacing * (rows - 1);
2790 if (totalWidth > component.Rect.Width)
2791 {
2792 slotSize = new Point(
2793 Math.Min((int)Math.Floor((slotSize.X - spacing) * (component.Rect.Width / totalWidth)),
2794 (int)Math.Floor((slotSize.Y - spacing) * (component.Rect.Height / totalHeight))));
2795 }
2796 int i = 0;
2797 Rectangle tooltipRect = Rectangle.Empty;
2798 LocalizedString tooltip = null;
2799 foreach (Identifier itemIdentifier in itemIdentifiers)
2800 {
2801 if (!(MapEntityPrefab.Find(null, identifier: itemIdentifier, showErrorMessages: false) is ItemPrefab itemPrefab)) { continue; }
2802
2803 int row = (int)Math.Floor(i / (float)slotCountPerRow);
2804 int slotsPerThisRow = Math.Min((slotCount - row * slotCountPerRow), slotCountPerRow);
2805 Vector2 slotPos = new Vector2(
2806 component.Rect.Center.X + (slotSize.X + spacing) * (i % slotCountPerRow - slotsPerThisRow * 0.5f),
2807 component.Rect.Bottom - (rows * (slotSize.Y + spacing)) + (slotSize.Y + spacing) * row);
2808
2809 Rectangle slotRect = new Rectangle(slotPos.ToPoint(), slotSize);
2810 Inventory.SlotSpriteSmall.Draw(spriteBatch, slotPos,
2811 scale: slotSize.X / (float)Inventory.SlotSpriteSmall.SourceRect.Width,
2812 color: slotRect.Contains(PlayerInput.MousePosition) ? Color.White : Color.White * 0.6f);
2813
2814 Sprite icon = itemPrefab.InventoryIcon ?? itemPrefab.Sprite;
2815 float iconScale = Math.Min(Math.Min(slotSize.X / icon.size.X, slotSize.Y / icon.size.Y), 2.0f) * 0.9f;
2816 icon.Draw(spriteBatch, slotPos + slotSize.ToVector2() * 0.5f, scale: iconScale);
2817
2818 int count = jobPrefab.Prefab.PreviewItems[jobPrefab.Variant].Count(it => it.ShowPreview && it.ItemIdentifier == itemIdentifier);
2819 if (count > 1)
2820 {
2821 string itemCountText = "x" + count;
2822 GUIStyle.Font.DrawString(spriteBatch, itemCountText, slotPos + slotSize.ToVector2() - GUIStyle.Font.MeasureString(itemCountText) - Vector2.UnitX * 5, Color.White);
2823 }
2824
2825 if (slotRect.Contains(PlayerInput.MousePosition))
2826 {
2827 tooltipRect = slotRect;
2828 tooltip = itemPrefab.Name + '\n' + itemPrefab.Description;
2829 }
2830 i++;
2831 }
2832 if (!tooltip.IsNullOrEmpty())
2833 {
2834 GUIComponent.DrawToolTip(spriteBatch, tooltip, tooltipRect);
2835 }
2836 }

2951 private bool SwitchJob(GUIButton _, object obj)
2952 {
2953 if (JobList == null || GameMain.Client == null) { return false; }
2954
2955 int childIndex = JobList.SelectedIndex;
2956 var child = JobList.SelectedComponent;

2962

2964

2966 if (existingChild != null && obj != null)
2967 {
2968 existingChild.UserData = prevObj;
2969 }
2970 child.UserData = obj;
2971
2972 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
2973 {
2974 if (i < 2 && JobList.Content.GetChild(i).UserData == null)
2975 {
2976 JobList.Content.GetChild(i).UserData = JobList.Content.GetChild(i + 1).UserData;
2977 JobList.Content.GetChild(i + 1).UserData = null;
2978 }
2979 }
2980

2982
2983 if (moveToNext)
2984 {
2985 var emptyChild = JobList.Content.FindChild(c => c.UserData == null && c.CanBeFocused);
2986 if (emptyChild != null)
2987 {
2988 JobList.Select(JobList.Content.GetChildIndex(emptyChild));
2989 }
2990 else
2991 {
2992 JobList.Deselect();
2993 if (JobSelectionFrame != null) { JobSelectionFrame.Visible = false; }
2994 }
2995 }
2996 else
2997 {
2998 OpenJobSelection(child, child.UserData);
2999 }
3000
3001 return false;

3004 private bool OpenJobSelection(GUIComponent _, object __)
3005 {
3006 if (JobSelectionFrame != null)
3007 {
3008 JobSelectionFrame.Visible = true;
3009 return true;
3010 }
3011
3012 Point frameSize = new Point(characterInfoFrame.Rect.Width, (int)(characterInfoFrame.Rect.Height * 2 * 0.6f));
3013 JobSelectionFrame = new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(frameSize, GUI.Canvas, Anchor.TopLeft)
3014 { AbsoluteOffset = new Point(characterInfoFrame.Rect.Right - frameSize.X, characterInfoFrame.Rect.Bottom) }, style:"GUIFrameListBox");
3015
3016 characterInfoFrame.RectTransform.SizeChanged += () =>
3017 {
3018 if (characterInfoFrame == null || JobSelectionFrame?.RectTransform == null) { return; }
3019 Point size = new Point(characterInfoFrame.Rect.Width, (int)(characterInfoFrame.Rect.Height * 2 * 0.6f));
3020 JobSelectionFrame.RectTransform.Resize(size);
3021 JobSelectionFrame.RectTransform.AbsoluteOffset = new Point(characterInfoFrame.Rect.Right - size.X, characterInfoFrame.Rect.Bottom);
3022 };
3023
3024 new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.25f, 1.25f), JobSelectionFrame.RectTransform, anchor: Anchor.Center), style: "OuterGlow", color: Color.Black)

3026 UserData = "outerglow",
3027 CanBeFocused = false
3028 };
3029
3030 var rows = new GUILayoutGroup(new RectTransform(Vector2.One, JobSelectionFrame.RectTransform)) { Stretch = true };
3031 var row = new GUILayoutGroup(new RectTransform(Vector2.One, rows.RectTransform), true);
3032
3033 GUIButton jobButton = null;
3034
3035 var availableJobs = JobPrefab.Prefabs.Where(jobPrefab =>
3036 jobPrefab.MaxNumber > 0 && JobList.Content.Children.All(c => !(c.UserData is JobVariant prefab) || prefab.Prefab != jobPrefab)
3037 ).Select(j => new JobVariant(j, 0));
3038
3039 availableJobs = availableJobs.Concat(
3040 JobPrefab.Prefabs.Where(jobPrefab =>
3041 jobPrefab.MaxNumber > 0 && JobList.Content.Children.Any(c => (c.UserData is JobVariant prefab) && prefab.Prefab == jobPrefab)
3042 ).Select(j => (JobVariant)JobList.Content.FindChild(c => (c.UserData is JobVariant prefab) && prefab.Prefab == j).UserData));
3043
3044 availableJobs = availableJobs.ToList();
3045
3046 int itemsInRow = 0;
3047
3048 foreach (var jobPrefab in availableJobs)
3049 {
3050 if (itemsInRow >= 3)
3051 {

3484 public readonly struct FailedSubInfo
3485 {
3486 public readonly string Name;
3487 public readonly string Hash;
3488 public FailedSubInfo(string name, string hash) { Name = name; Hash = hash; }
3489 public void Deconstruct(out string name, out string hash) { name = Name; hash = Hash; }
3490
3491 private static bool StringsEqual(string a, string b)
3492 => string.Equals(a, b, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);
3493
3494 public static bool operator ==(FailedSubInfo a, FailedSubInfo b)
3495 => StringsEqual(a.Name, b.Name) && StringsEqual(a.Hash, b.Hash);
3496
3497 public static bool operator !=(FailedSubInfo a, FailedSubInfo b)
3498 => !(a == b);
3499 }
3500
3501 public FailedSubInfo? FailedSelectedSub;
3502 public FailedSubInfo? FailedSelectedShuttle;
3503
3504 public List<FailedSubInfo> FailedCampaignSubs = new List<FailedSubInfo>();
3505 public List<FailedSubInfo> FailedOwnedSubs = new List<FailedSubInfo>();
3506
3507 public bool TrySelectSub(string subName, string md5Hash, GUIListBox subList)
3508 {
3509 UpdateSubVisibility();
3510 if (GameMain.Client == null) { return false; }
3511
3512 //already downloading the selected sub file
3513 if (GameMain.Client.FileReceiver.ActiveTransfers.Any(t => t.FileName == subName + ".sub"))
3514 {
3515 return false;
3516 }
3517
3518 SubmarineInfo sub = subList.Content.Children
3519 .FirstOrDefault(c => c.UserData is SubmarineInfo s && s.Name == subName && s.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation == md5Hash)?
3520 .UserData as SubmarineInfo;
3521
3522 //matching sub found and already selected, all good
3523 if (sub != null)
3524 {
3525 if (subList == this.SubList)
3526 {
3527 CreateSubPreview(sub);
3528 }
3529
3530 if (subList.SelectedData is SubmarineInfo selectedSub && selectedSub.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation == md5Hash && Barotrauma.IO.File.Exists(sub.FilePath))
3531 {
3532 return true;
3533 }
3534 }
3535
3536 //sub not found, see if we have a sub with the same name
3537 if (sub == null)
3538 {
3539 sub = subList.Content.Children
3540 .FirstOrDefault(c => c.UserData is SubmarineInfo s && s.Name == subName)?
3541 .UserData as SubmarineInfo;
3542 }
3543
3544 //found a sub that at least has the same name, select it
3545 if (sub != null)
3546 {
3547 if (subList.Parent is GUIDropDown subDropDown)
3548 {
3549 subDropDown.SelectItem(sub);
3550 }
3551 else
3552 {
3553 subList.OnSelected -= VotableClicked;
3554 subList.Select(sub, force: true);
3555 subList.OnSelected += VotableClicked;
3556 }
3557
3558 if (subList == SubList)
3559 FailedSelectedSub = null;
3560 else
3561 FailedSelectedShuttle = null;
3562
3563 //hashes match, all good
3564 if (sub.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation == md5Hash && SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.Contains(sub))
3565 {
3566 return true;
3567 }
3568 }
3569
3570 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3571 //if we get to this point, a matching sub was not found or it has an incorrect MD5 hash
3572
3573 if (subList == SubList)
3574 {
3575 FailedSelectedSub = new FailedSubInfo(subName, md5Hash);
3576 }
3577 else
3578 {
3579 FailedSelectedShuttle = new FailedSubInfo(subName, md5Hash);
3580 }
3581
3582 LocalizedString errorMsg = "";
3583 if (sub == null || !SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.Contains(sub))
3584 {
3585 errorMsg = TextManager.GetWithVariable("SubNotFoundError", "[subname]", subName) + " ";
3586 }
3587 else if (sub.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation == null)
3588 {
3589 errorMsg = TextManager.GetWithVariable("SubLoadError", "[subname]", subName) + " ";
3590 GUITextBlock textBlock = subList.Content.GetChildByUserData(sub)?.GetChild<GUITextBlock>();
3591 if (textBlock != null) { textBlock.TextColor = GUIStyle.Red; }
3592 }
3593 else
3594 {
3595 errorMsg = TextManager.GetWithVariables("SubDoesntMatchError",
3596 ("[subname]", sub.Name),
3597 ("[myhash]", sub.MD5Hash.ShortRepresentation),
3598 ("[serverhash]", Md5Hash.GetShortHash(md5Hash))) + " ";
3599 }
3600
3601 if (GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.AllowFileTransfers)
3602 {
3603 GameMain.Client?.RequestFile(FileTransferType.Submarine, subName, md5Hash);
3604 }
3605 else
3606 {
3607 new GUIMessageBox(TextManager.Get("DownloadSubLabel"), errorMsg);
3608 }
3609 return false;
3610 }
3611
3612 public enum SubmarineDeliveryData
3613 {
3614 Owned,
3615 Campaign
3616 }
3617
3618 public bool CheckIfCampaignSubMatches(SubmarineInfo serverSubmarine, SubmarineDeliveryData deliveryData)
3619 {
3620 if (GameMain.Client == null) { return false; }
3621
3622 //already downloading the selected sub file
3623 if (GameMain.Client.FileReceiver.ActiveTransfers.Any(t => t.FileName == serverSubmarine.Name + ".sub"))
3624 {
3625 return false;
3626 }
3627
3628 SubmarineInfo purchasableSub = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == serverSubmarine.Name && s.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation == serverSubmarine.MD5Hash?.StringRepresentation);
3629 if (purchasableSub != null)
3630 {
3631 return true;
3632 }
3633
3634 FailedSubInfo fileInfo = new FailedSubInfo(serverSubmarine.Name, serverSubmarine.MD5Hash.StringRepresentation);
3635
3636 switch (deliveryData)
3637 {
3638 case SubmarineDeliveryData.Owned:
3639 FailedOwnedSubs.Add(fileInfo);
3640 break;
3641 case SubmarineDeliveryData.Campaign:
3642 FailedCampaignSubs.Add(fileInfo);
3643 break;
3644 }
3645
3646 GameMain.Client?.RequestFile(FileTransferType.Submarine, fileInfo.Name, fileInfo.Hash);
3647
3648 return false;
3649 }

3696
3697 void handleDraggingAcrossLists(GUIListBox from, GUIListBox to)
3698 {
3699 //TODO: put this in a static class once modding-refactor gets merged
3700
3701 if (to.Rect.Contains(PlayerInput.MousePosition) && from.DraggedElement != null)
3702 {
3703 //move the dragged elements to the index determined previously
3704 var draggedElement = from.DraggedElement;
3705
3706 var selected = from.AllSelected.ToList();
3707 selected.Sort((a, b) => from.Content.GetChildIndex(a) - from.Content.GetChildIndex(b));
3708
3709 float oldCount = to.Content.CountChildren;
3710 float newCount = oldCount + selected.Count;
3711
3712 var offset = draggedElement.RectTransform.AbsoluteOffset;
3713 offset += from.Content.Rect.Location;
3714 offset -= to.Content.Rect.Location;
3715
3716 for (int i = 0; i < selected.Count; i++)
3717 {
3718 var c = selected[i];
3719 c.Parent.RemoveChild(c);
3720 c.RectTransform.Parent = to.Content.RectTransform;
3721 c.RectTransform.RepositionChildInHierarchy((int)oldCount+i);
3722 }
3723
3724 from.DraggedElement = null;
3725 from.Deselect();
3726 from.RecalculateChildren();
3727 from.RectTransform.RecalculateScale(true);
3728 to.RecalculateChildren();
3729 to.RectTransform.RecalculateScale(true);
3730 to.Select(selected);
3731
3732 //recalculate the dragged element's offset so it doesn't jump around
3733 draggedElement.RectTransform.AbsoluteOffset = offset;
3734
3735 to.DraggedElement = draggedElement;
3736
3737 to.BarScroll = to.BarScroll * (oldCount / newCount);
3738 }
3739 }
3740
3741 var visibleSubsList = createColumnListBox("VisibleSubmarines");
3742 var centerColumn = createColumn(0.1f);
3743
3744 void centerSpacing()
3745 {
3746 new GUIFrame(new RectTransform(new Vector2(1.0f, 0.4f), centerColumn.RectTransform), style: null);
3747 }

3788
3789 foreach (var sub in GameMain.Client.ServerSubmarines
3790 .OrderBy(s => visibilityMenuOrder.Contains(s))
3791 .ThenBy(s => visibilityMenuOrder.IndexOf(s)))
3792 {
3793 addSubToList(sub,
3794 GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.HiddenSubs.Contains(sub.Name) ? hiddenSubsList : visibleSubsList);
3795 }
3796
3797 void onRearranged(GUIListBox listBox, object userData)
3798 {
3799 visibilityMenuOrder.Clear();
3800 visibilityMenuOrder.AddRange(visibleSubsList.Content.Children.Select(c => c.UserData as SubmarineInfo));
3801 visibilityMenuOrder.AddRange(hiddenSubsList.Content.Children.Select(c => c.UserData as SubmarineInfo));
3802 }
3803
3804 visibleSubsList.OnRearranged = onRearranged;
3805 hiddenSubsList.OnRearranged = onRearranged;
3806
3807 void swapListItems(GUIListBox from, GUIListBox to)
3808 {
3809 to.Deselect();
3810 var selected = from.AllSelected.ToArray();
3811 int lastIndex = from.Content.GetChildIndex(selected.LastOrDefault());
3812 int nextIndex = lastIndex + 1;
3813 GUIComponent nextComponent = null;
3814 if (lastIndex >= 0 && nextIndex < from.Content.CountChildren)
3815 {
3816 nextComponent = from.Content.GetChild(nextIndex);
3817 }
3818 foreach (var frame in selected)
3819 {
3820 frame.Parent.RemoveChild(frame);
3821 frame.RectTransform.Parent = to.Content.RectTransform;
3822 }
3823 from.RecalculateChildren();
3824 from.RectTransform.RecalculateScale(true);
3825 to.RecalculateChildren();
3826 to.RectTransform.RecalculateScale(true);
3827 to.Select(selected);
3828 if (nextComponent != null) { from.Select(nextComponent.ToEnumerable()); }
3829 }
3830
3831 centerSpacing();
3832 var visibleToHidden = centerButton("GUIButtonToggleRight");
3833 visibleToHidden.OnClicked = (button, o) =>
3834 {
3835 swapListItems(visibleSubsList, hiddenSubsList);
3836 return false;
3837 };
3838 var hiddenToVisible = centerButton("GUIButtonToggleLeft");
3839 hiddenToVisible.OnClicked = (button, o) =>
3840 {
3841 swapListItems(hiddenSubsList, visibleSubsList);
3842 return false;
3843 };

3904 public void UpdateSubVisibility()
3905 {
3906 foreach (GUIComponent child in SubList.Content.Children)
3907 {
3908 if (!(child.UserData is SubmarineInfo sub)) { continue; }
3909 child.Visible =
3910 (!GameMain.Client.ServerSettings.HiddenSubs.Contains(sub.Name)
3911 || (GameMain.GameSession?.SubmarineInfo != null && GameMain.GameSession.SubmarineInfo.Name.Equals(sub.Name, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)))
3912 && (string.IsNullOrEmpty(subSearchBox.Text) || sub.DisplayName.Contains(subSearchBox.Text, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));
3913 }
3914 }
